SELECT gl.*,gt.`goodsTypeName` FROM goodstypes AS gts INNER JOIN goodslist AS gl ON gl.`goodsId`=gts.`goodsId` INNER JOIN goodsType AS gt ON gt.`goodsTypeId`=gts.`goodsTypeId` where 1=1 and gts.`goodsTypeId`=#{int} and isShelves = 1 ORDER BY `weight`
